data.name: Gangsta: The Return
data.detailed_description:
Game story:


Super soldier Gangsta is coming back. Now mission is to find evil army captured virus at 12 different levels. Player can use 2 different weapons rifle and handgun. Also 3 different magical skills available: Fireball, Electric attack, Ice attack. Different attacks affect differently depending enemy type
Game contains different enemies like slowly and stupid zombie. Fast and difficult soldier with weapons, Monsters with different attacks and flying turrets with powerful missile gun. Player can some levels use armored hover police car which has 2 powerful weapons and kill lot of enemies more easily.
Collect also injectors which will increase player health during fighting. So be the hero Gangsta again and kill evil enemy army and save virus

Features::

- 12 different themed levels
- 2 different weapons: Rifle and handgun
- Ammo pick-ups
- Player has magical skills like fireball, electric charge and ice attack
- Collect drug spikes to increase your health
- Drivable hover police car with weapons
- Several different enemies
- ZOMBIE: simple slow enemy with melee attack
- SOLDIER: Mutant soldier with weapons
- MONSTER: Monster with different attack
- FLYING TURRET: Flying enemy with powerful weapons
- Steam achievements
- Deathly gas area. Areas which decrease player health

data.short_description: Gangsta series will return. Now you are super gangsta soldier and need find captured virus. Use different weapons and magical skills to destroy enormous evil army

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 8
  • Processor: i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nividia 2000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: direct x9
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nividia 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct x9
